Actions.Name: Get 2 Way SMS's numbers
Actions.Description: Get a list of 2 Way SMS's numbers through your Mensagia account.

Actions.Name: Create a Contact
Actions.Description: Create a contact inside your Mensagia's account.

Actions.Name: Get 2 Way SMS
Actions.Description: Get a list of 2 Way SMS through your Mensagia account.

Actions.Name: Send 2 Way SMS
Actions.Description: Send a 2 Way SMS to your contacts through your Mensagia account.

Actions.Name: Send SMS
Actions.Description: Send SMS's to your contacts through your Mensagia account.

Actions.Name: Send SMS Campaigns
Actions.Description: Send SMS Campaigns to your contacts through your Mensagia account.

Actions.Name: Send Transactional Email
Actions.Description: Send a Transactional email to your contacts using your custom templates from Mensagia.

Actions.Name: Send Voice Message
Actions.Description: This method allows you to carry out Voice campaigns to telephone numbers in Spain. The recipients of the voice campaign can be: agendas, agendas and telephone numbers, or telephone numbers.
